original_text: Then the men of Benjamin rallied behind Abner. They formed themselves into a group and took their stand on top of a hill.
korean_text: 베냐민 족속은 함께 모여 아브넬을 따라 한 무리를 이루고 작은 산 꼭대기에 섰더라

sentences.original_text: Then the men of Benjamin rallied behind Abner.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 베냐민 사람들이 아브너 뒤에 모였습니다.

sentences.original_text: They formed themselves into a group
and took their stand on top of a hill.
